name: Lioness Multiplayer
description:
World of Lioness Multiplayer

Enter this massive safari world as a young lioness. Chase down some Buffalo or Gazelle and have some lunch. Be sure and keep your hunger full. Run your way to victory in this high quality Lioness simulator. Avoid total chaos and come out as the ultimate lioness. There may be some large male lions nearby, so be on the lookout.

Realistic 3D Fantasy World with Dragons, Wolf, Knights, Warriors, Giraffe, Rhino, Crocodiles, and many more.

Customize your animal with multiple color options. Coat colors include Brindle, Black, Brown, and Harlequin.

Note : Choose between the Online Multiplayer and Offline Maps. If you don't want to play with other people, you don't have to.

TOP GAME FEATURES :

-- Control your very own Female Lion!!
-- Real-Time Online and Offline 3D Animal Simulator
-- Huge 3D Open World Safari Map
-- 4 Special Skills - Shield, Fireball, Ice, Electricity
-- Loaded with enemies Rhinos, Knights, Cats, Elephants, Cheetahs, Giraffe, and even Dragons
-- Ultra Realistic Weather Simulation with highly realistic lightning and thunder effects
-- Tournament style multiplayer mode
-- Now includes Dragons!
-- BONUS FEATURE : Online Chat
Locate all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your magic. Upgrade your animal speed, strength, and stamina. Use your magic skills selectively against your foes.

Visit our Wildfoot Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for cool updates and new releases.  We concentrate on making high quality, 3D animal simulators. Some people have commented on the therapeutic value of our games. These compliments are very heartwarming. Have a Wildfoot day and thanks for playing!
